description: While bread is satisfying to make, it is a lengthy process and can be quite difficult. Cornbread rises with baking powder, not yeast, so is quicker to prepare and easier to produce. Young bakers should start out with easy recipes such as this. Adding sweetcorn to the batter is another thing guaranteed to please children and adults alike.
name: Cornbread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: When it is ready, the bread should shrink from the sides of the pan and a skewer inserted into the centre should emerge clean. Let the cornbread cool slightly. Serve, in wedges, with soup.
